statements.select: SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_events_gy where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1 and EveresName='155' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate#)
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO aers_tbl_events_gy ( EvegyId, EveresId, HospId, HospDepId, HappenedDate, SendtoDate, FillStaff, HospNumber, PatientSex, PatientAge, PatientAgeUnit, NursLevel, Diagnosis, PutDrugs, Dispensation, PDAState, GyLevel, GylName, GylRight, GylError, GylRoute, GylRouteQt, GylRateState, EventDescription, EventLevel, StaffType, StaffTypeQt, StaffPosition, StaffEducation, StaffEduQt, StaffWorkyears, BedUtilization, BedNurseRatio, AuditFeedback, AuditStatus, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID
) VALUES ( #EvegyId#, #EveresId#, #HospId#, #HospDepId#, #HappenedDate#, #SendtoDate#, #FillStaff#, #HospNumber#, #PatientSex#, #PatientAge#, #PatientAgeUnit#, #NursLevel#, #Diagnosis#, #PutDrugs#, #Dispensation#, #PDAState#, #GyLevel#, #GylName#, #GylRight#, #GylError#, #GylRoute#, #GylRouteQt#, #GylRateState#, #EventDescription#, #EventLevel#, #StaffType#, #StaffTypeQt#, #StaffPosition#, #StaffEducation#, #StaffEduQt#, #StaffWorkyears#, #BedUtilization#, #BedNurseRatio#, #AuditFeedback#, #AuditStatus#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_events_gy SET EvegyId = #EvegyId#, EveresId = #EveresId#, HospId = #HospId#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, FillStaff = #FillStaff#, HospNumber = #HospNumber#, PatientSex = #PatientSex#, PatientAge = #PatientAge#, PatientAgeUnit=#PatientAgeUnit#, NursLevel = #NursLevel#, Diagnosis = #Diagnosis#, PutDrugs = #PutDrugs#, Dispensation = #Dispensation#, PDAState = #PDAState#, GyLevel = #GyLevel#, GylName = #GylName#, GylRight = #GylRight#, GylError = #GylError#, GylRoute = #GylRoute#, GylRouteQt = #GylRouteQt#, GylRateState = #GylRateState#, EventDescription = #EventDescription#, EventLevel = #EventLevel#, StaffType = #StaffType#, StaffTypeQt = #StaffTypeQt#, StaffPosition = #StaffPosition#, StaffEducation = #StaffEducation#, StaffEduQt = #StaffEduQt#, StaffWorkyears = #StaffWorkyears#, BedUtilization = #BedUtilization#, BedNurseRatio = #BedNurseRatio#, AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID# WHERE (EvegyId = #EvegyId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_events_gy SET AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
